Posts.Content: was told i had breast cancer last march at the age of 37  grade 3 aggressive had the lump removed and starter F E C chemo for 18 weeks and then 4 weeks radio so finished at the beginning of nov and went on tamoxifen with little side affects then was hit with another lump on the same breast  before Christmas so i just left it till last friday then was told by the consultant there i a high chance it has spread to the lymph gland so i have to go throw all the test again and with the hope it is nuthing how do u cope with bad news again ,
Posts.Title: bad news again

Posts.Content: hi Mai , Tess thanks for your ur reply i hope you get throw all the chemo and raido will little or no side affects  it is good to no that i am not the only one with smiler storys take care  love coreen (dragon lady) xx
Posts.Title: bad news again
